#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <utility>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        int N;
        cin>>N;
        vector<pair<int,int> > time;
        for(int i=0; i<N; i++)
        {
            int a,b;
            cin>>a>>b;
            time.push_back(make_pair(b,a));
        }
        sort(time.begin(),time.end());
        int counter=1,blocked=time[0].first;
        for(int i=1; i<N; i++)
        {
            if(time[i].second>blocked)
            {
                counter++;
                blocked=time[i].first;
            }
        }
        cout<<counter<<'\n';
    }

}
